caption.p: Pathway prediction and clinical association. For every module, the independent validation performance of the strongest radiomic based pathway predictors is indicated per module by the area under the curve (AUC) of the receiver operator characteristic. In addition, we highlight whether a module was significantly associated with overall survival (OS), TNM stage (ST), or pathologic histology (HI) (p<0.05).

tr.td: Laplace of Gaussian intensity standard deviation → Autodegration of the E3 Ubiquitin ligase COP1
Wavelet minimum intensity → Trafficking of GLUR2 containing AMPA receptors
Texture information correlation → Trafficking of GLUR2 containing AMPA receptors
Wavelet texture cluster prominence → Notch1 intracellular domain regulation of transcription
Laplace of Gaussian intensity entropy → RNA polymerase III transcription
Laplace of Gaussian intensity standard deviation → Pyruvate metabolism and citric acid TCA cycle
Wavelet intensity variance → Trafficking of GLUR2 containing AMPA receptors
Shape compactness and shape sphericity → TRAF6 mediated NFkB activation
Wavelet texture cluster tendency → Platelet aggregation plug formation
Wavelet texture entropy → G0 and early G1
Laplace of Gaussian intensity entropy → RNA polymerase II transcription initiation and promoter opening
